articles.author: James Vincent
articles.title: The latest leak of Google's upcoming Pixel Watch shows off a familiar design - The Verge
articles.description: Google’s long-awaited Pixel Watch might finally be unveiled at next month’s I/O conference. A newly-leaked render of the device lines up with previous rumors, but still leaves us guessing about specs and features.
articles.content:
